title: Is Redmi note 5 pro long lasting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not at all, it has no type of scratch resistance, no gorilla glaals, no spill or water resistance. The glass covering lens is prone to scratches and damage. Indeed it has good performance and camera for the price but it is not at all durable. Just don’t let it fall from more than roughly 3 feet.

according to my point of view all phones are not long lasting. You can use the particular phones upto 2–3 years. It depends upon the usage. If you play memory consuming games then it will last for 2 years. So it’s totally depend on uses. Now a days people change the bikes according to trend. that’s only mobile. no one is perfect. Thanks
